applyDeviceSetting

void applyDeviceSetting(DeviceSettingDTO setting,
                        int accessID)
                        throws SettingException,
                               MicroscopeLockedException,
                               MicroscopeException,
                               java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the given device property to the given value. Does synchronize to the devices afterwards.

Parameters:
setting - Structure containing device, property and value configuration.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
SettingException
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException

applyDeviceSettings

void applyDeviceSettings(DeviceSettingDTO[] settings,
                         int accessID)
                         throws SettingException,
                                MicroscopeLockedException,
                                MicroscopeException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the given device properties to the given values. Same as calling setDeviceSetting for every element in the array, except that the microscope is locked during the whole procedure, thus either all or none of the settings is set. Does synchronize to the devices afterwards.

Parameters:
settings - Array of structures containing device, property and value configurations.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
SettingException
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException

applyDeviceSettingAsync

void applyDeviceSettingAsync(DeviceSettingDTO setting,
                             int accessID)
                             throws SettingException,
                                    MicroscopeLockedException,
                                    MicroscopeException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the given device property to the given value. Does not synchronize to the devices afterwards (i.e. does not wait for the actions to be finished).

Parameters:
setting - Structure containing device, property and value configuration.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
SettingException
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException

applyDeviceSettingsAsync

void applyDeviceSettingsAsync(DeviceSettingDTO[] settings,
                              int accessID)
                              throws SettingException,
                                     MicroscopeLockedException,
                                     MicroscopeException,
                                     java.lang.InterruptedException
Sets the given device properties to the given values. Same as calling setDeviceSetting for every element in the array, except that the microscope is locked during the whole procedure, thus either all or none of the settings is set. Does not synchronize to the devices afterwards (i.e. does not wait for the actions to be finished).

Parameters:
settings - Array of structures containing device, property and value configurations.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
SettingException
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException

lockExclusiveWrite

void lockExclusiveWrite(int accessID)
                        throws MicroscopeLockedException
Locks the microscope for a longer time (e.g. for the duration of a measurement), such that only the locker may acquire the write lock to the microscope. However, read locks may be acquired, as long as the thread is not actually acquiring the write-lock... Must be surrounded by a try-finally block with unlockExclusiveWrite in the finally statement.

Parameters:
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException - Thrown if microscope is already locked for a longer time by somebody else.

unlockExclusiveWrite

void unlockExclusiveWrite(int accessID)
                          throws MicroscopeLockedException
Unlocks the previously acquired lock.

Parameters:
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID or not locked at all, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
MicroscopeLockedException - Thrown if this microscope object is not the owner of the exclusive write lock.

loadConfiguration

java.lang.String loadConfiguration(java.io.Reader configurationReader,
                                   int accessID)
                                   throws MicroscopeConfigurationException,
                                          MicroscopeLockedException,
                                          java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                          MicroscopeException
Initializes the microscope with the configuration read from the reader (e.g. a FileReader to load a configuration file). If the configuration contained errors, a MicroscopeConfigurationException is thrown. If the configuration could be loaded, there still exists the possibility that YouScope believes that this configuration is not complete, belongs to a different version or was created by a different program, which all give a hint that the configuration process should be rerun. In this case a short message is passed as return value, giving a hint how should be proceeded, and which should be displayed to the user. If the configuration is believed to be complete and compatible, null is returned.

Parameters:
configurationReader - A reader to read in the configuration, e.g. a file reader.
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Returns:
A message describing why this configuration may be defective, or null, if this configuration is believed to be not defective.
Throws:
MicroscopeConfigurationException
MicroscopeLockedException
MicroscopeException
java.lang.InterruptedException

saveConfiguration

void saveConfiguration(java.io.Writer configurationWriter)
                       throws MicroscopeConfigurationException
Writes the current microscope configuration to the supplied writer (e.g. a file writer).

Parameters:
configurationWriter - The writer to which the configuration should be written.
Throws:
MicroscopeConfigurationException - Thrown if the configuration could not be generated.

getLastConfigurationWarning

java.lang.String getLastConfigurationWarning()
Returns the warning message generated and returned when loaded the last configuration, or null if no warning appeared. See return value of loadConfigFile(...);

Returns:
Last warning message when loading a configuration.

uninitializeMicroscope

void uninitializeMicroscope(int accessID)
                            throws MicroscopeException,
                                   MicroscopeLockedException,
                                   java.lang.InterruptedException
Uninitializes the microscope. All loaded devices are unload.

Parameters:
accessID - The access ID of the current microscope object. If the microscope is locked with a different accessID, a MicroscopeLockedException is thrown.
Throws:
MicroscopeException
MicroscopeLockedException
java.lang.InterruptedException

emergencyStop

void emergencyStop()
Stops the XY stage of the microscope and prevents ASAP any other thread to obtain access to the microscope.

resetEmergencyStop

void resetEmergencyStop()
Resets the emergency-stop state, such that microscope can be accessed again.

isEmergencyStopped

boolean isEmergencyStopped()
Returns true if microscope is currently in the emergency-stop state.

Returns:
TRUE if emergency-stopped.

listener - The listener.

void removeMessageListener(YouScopeMessageListener listener)

Parameters:
listener - The listener.
